text:
I recently visited Little Thirsty at Changi Road, and it was a great experience overall! The ambiance was cozy and inviting, perfect for a casual hangout. The staff were friendly and attentive, and the service was quick. I tried their fried pork and was impressed by the unique flavors and quality making it the best pairing complement the drinks.

During the happy hour the Guinness is going for 2 for $24 as well.

Overall, a solid spot for anyone looking to unwind with great drinks and a chill vibe. Will definitely return!

Nice watering hole along Changi Road. Whisky lovers should visit, as they have a nice range of excellent bottles!

Food was great! Do try the satays with your drinks

Owner Kenny was really friendly and very well versed in Whisky’s. He shared his vast knowledge with us, and kindly showed us some of the store’s prized possessions (see pictures)

We will be back!

I wish I could give more than 5 stars! What an incredible evening at The Whistle. Massive shoutout to Kenny for being such an amazing host. Your hospitality and friendliness will never be forgotten. A breath of fresh air to receive the service we experienced tonight. In addition to Kenny’s top notch service service, the food was incredible! Highly recommend the bangers n mash and the fish and chips along with the platters! My husband also loved his smash burger! There wasn’t a single thing that we didn’t enjoy. I cannot wait to be back for another phenomenal experience! 10/10 for sure!!

Draught beer is fresh and nice. Butterflied chicken wing was roasted to perfect crisp, nice to pair with beer. Pork chop is juicy delicious, first choice as main course. Bar in good vibes. Nice place to chill and bite.

Thanking Kenny for serving us, and Wei Xiang for the wonderful meal! Came here due to a longing to eat bangers & mash, but the wife ordered the burger. The best fries I have ever eaten in the world if you want to eat a perfectly crispy one!!! Must come and try
